```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
library(scmap)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggsci)
```


Three datasets: Purified PBMC, lung, brain
Dataframe should capture dataset, cell name, true label, pred label, binary indicator whether the prediction is correct, and the method.
```{r}

# sorted pbmc
seurat_preds <- load("/stornext/General/data/academic/lab_davis/Yi_Soroor/benchmarking/RData_files_for_method_evals/sorted_pbmc_seurat_transferData_preds.RData")
scmap_preds <- load("/stornext/General/data/academic/lab_davis/Yi_Soroor/benchmarking/RData_files_for_method_evals/sorted_pbmc_scmap_preds.RData")
singler_preds <- load("/stornext/General/data/academic/lab_davis/Yi_Soroor/benchmarking/RData_files_for_method_evals/SingleR_preds_sorted_pbmc.RData")
garnett_preds <- load("/stornext/General/data/academic/lab_davis/Yi_Soroor/benchmarking/RData_files_for_method_evals/garnett_pbmc_sorted.RData")
scdecaf_preds <- load("/stornext/General/data/academic/lab_davis/Yi_Soroor/benchmarking/RData_files_for_method_evals/sorted_pbmc_scDECAF_preds.RData")

ggdat_pbmc <- data.frame(cells = ann_res$cell,
                         dataset = rep("sorted_pbmc", nrow(ann_res)),
                         true_labels  = gsub("(.*)_(.*)","\\1", ann_res$cell),
                         scDECAF = ann_res$reassigned_celltype,
                         garnett = pbmc_cds$cell_type,
                         scmap = as.character(scmapCell_clusters_sortedpbmc$scmap_cluster_labs),
                         singler = pred.sortedPPMC$labels,
                         seurat = sorted.pbmc$predicted.id)




renamed_ref_celltypes <- ggdat_pbmc$true_labels
renamed_ref_celltypes <- gsub("Memory T cells|Naive CD4 T cells|Regulatory T cells|CD4 T helper","CD4 T cells",
                              renamed_ref_celltypes)



renamed_ref_celltypes <- gsub("Cytotoxic T cells|Naive CD8 T cells","CD8 T cells",renamed_ref_celltypes)


# need accuracy per cell type per dataset, and the population size for each celltype per dataset
#the proportion of a cell type in the total population
n_by_celltype <- table(renamed_ref_celltypes)
celltype_props_in_total_population <- n_by_celltype/nrow(ggdat_pbmc)



ggdat_pbmc <- reshape2::melt(ggdat_pbmc, id = c("cells","dataset","true_labels"))


equivalent_labels <- list("B cells" = "B cells",
                          "CD14 Monocytes" = c("CD14+ Monocytes","Monocytes"),
                          "CD56 NK" = c("NK cells", "Natural killer cell"),
                          "CD4 T cells" = c("CD4 T cells", "CD4+ T cell"),
                          "CD8 T cells" = c("CD8+ T cell","CD8 T cells")
                          )




reference_celltypes <- unique(renamed_ref_celltypes)

per_cell_type_f1 <- list()

for (i in reference_celltypes){
  accpted_labels <- equivalent_labels[[i]]
  pred_status <- ifelse(ggdat_pbmc$value[renamed_ref_celltypes == i] %in% accpted_labels,                                                                1,0)
  true_positives <- table(ggdat_pbmc$variable[renamed_ref_celltypes == i], pred_status)[,"1"]
  false_negatives <- table(ggdat_pbmc$variable[renamed_ref_celltypes == i], pred_status)[,"0"]
  pred_negs <- ifelse(ggdat_pbmc$value[renamed_ref_celltypes != i] %in% accpted_labels,
                                                                 1,0)
  false_positives <- ifelse(length(unique(pred_negs))>1, table(ggdat_pbmc$variable[renamed_ref_celltypes != i], 
                                                               pred_negs)[,"1"],0)
  precision <- true_positives/(true_positives+false_positives)
  recall <- true_positives/(true_positives+false_negatives)
  per_cell_type_f1[[i]] <- 2*(precision*recall/(precision+recall))
  
}

per_cell_type_f1 <- do.call(cbind, per_cell_type_f1)
per_cell_type_f1 <- data.frame(per_cell_type_f1, method = rownames(per_cell_type_f1))
per_cell_type_f1 <- reshape2::melt(per_cell_type_f1, id = "method")

per_cell_type_f1$variable <- gsub("\\."," ", per_cell_type_f1$variable)
per_cell_type_f1$celltype_prop_in_ref <- as.numeric(celltype_props_in_total_population[as.character(per_cell_type_f1$variable)])


per_cell_type_f1$variable <- factor(per_cell_type_f1$variable, levels = names(celltype_props_in_total_population)[order(celltype_props_in_total_population)])
per_cell_type_f1$method <- factor(per_cell_type_f1$method, levels = c("scDECAF","singler", "seurat","scmap","garnett"))

ggplot(per_cell_type_f1, aes(x=variable, y = value, size = celltype_prop_in_ref, color= method)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.11) + scale_color_manual(values = c("garnett" = "blue",
                                              "scmap"="darkgreen", "singler"="green", "seurat"="orange", "scDECAF" = "red")) +
  labs(x="", y="F1 - Sorted PBMC")  +
  theme_minimal() +
   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -45, vjust = 1, hjust = 0, size=11),
         axis.title.y = element_text(vjust = 3, hjust = 0.5, size = 12), legend.position = "none") +
  coord_fixed(ratio=2.5) 

# Boxplot

ggplot(per_cell_type_f1, aes(x=method, y = value, fill=method)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("garnett" = "blue",
                                              "scmap"="darkgreen", "singler"="green", "seurat"="orange", "scDECAF" = "red")) +
  labs(x="", y="F1 - Sorted PBMC")  +
  theme_minimal() +
   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -45, vjust = 1, hjust = 0, size=11),
         axis.title.y = element_text(vjust = 3, hjust = 0.5, size = 12), legend.position = "none") +
  coord_fixed(ratio=2.5) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels=c("garnett" = "Garnett",
                                              "scmap"="Scmap", "singler"="SingleR", "seurat"="Seurat", "scDECAF" = "scDECAF"))

```
